record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Leigh Ann Ross, a fellow in the office of Senator THAD COCHRAN, be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of Senate debate on the 2007 FDA reauthorization bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Thomas Kraus, an intern on my staff, be granted floor privileges for the remainder of the debate on the Food and Drug Administration Revitalization Act of 2007.

record.chair: Without objecting it is so ordered.
